description: The equipment command response segment contains the receiving components response to the previously received command.

1.name: Command Response
1.description: This field identifies the response of the previously issued command. Refer to User-defined Table 0387 – Command response for valid values

2.name: Date/Time Completed
2.description: his field contains the date and time that the receiving component completed the requested command

3.name: Command Response Parameters
3.description: This field identifies any associated parameters that relate to the returned response command message
